name: Prism Woods
description:
Welcome to the Prism Woods! Here, the animals and plant life all continually change colors to suit their moods. You play as a butterfly that must evade the Bugsnatcher by blending in with the falling leaves. Be careful though, as the trees change colors, so too will the leaves. Whenever you are exposed, the Bugsnatcher's bottle will be closing in - so keep to the leaves!

===================================

CONTROLS

[A][D] keys to move side to side

[S] to fall slightly faster

[Space] to flutter upwards

===================================

This game was made for TriJam #123, the jam where all games should be made in no more than three hours! The game jam's theme was "Hide or Get Caught". I incorporated this with the butterfly's ability to conceal itself when in front of leaves that are the same color as it. If the butterfly is not hidden, then it gets snatched!

This was a solo effort and I used each of the following:

All code and graphics - GameMaker Studio 2

Music - Composed in Beepbox

Sound Effect - Halftone Sound Effects Pack
